content:
The code chunk is situated within the manipulation logic where selected 3D objects are moved relative to a widget in a 3D environment, followed by notifying listeners about the completed manipulation for further processing.

This chunk fits into the overall context of manipulating 3D objects using widgets, specifically after selecting objects and determining their movement.

# Move all the selected objects with widget
            # Move the objects with the widget
            ShowBaseGlobal.direct.selected.moveWrtWidgetAll()
            # Let everyone know that something was moved
            messenger.send('DIRECT_manipulateObjectCleanup',
                           [ShowBaseGlobal.direct.selected.getSelectedAsList()])
